name: Explode On Contact
description:
Venture through the levels with your robot pal to get to the end. You must be careful, those spikes are dangerous. If you were to touch those, you will explode. So good luck and have fun.

Your main adjective is to get to the goal at the end of each level.

- You will travel through 3 areas.

*The Factory for witch you were created. Go through the obstacles and escape the factory.

*The Desert where the factory is located. Go through a sandy terrain ad go enter an ancient tomb.

*go through the grassy fields. then enter the last level. This level puts all your skills to the test.

Good Luck because there are no checkpoints.


+ This game is compatible with keyboard.

-WASD to move and jump. Space can also jump.
